QuestData.Title: Spirits' Belongings
QuestData.Description:
You are no Zandalari, but your spirit burns with a passion I have not seen in many years.
I am de wavebinder. It is through me dat de loa bless our ships. I will not see my home tainted by dese talking rocks.
Gather my bijous, my grimoire, and some of our fallen I set aside for just such an occasion.
De brutes think dey have won. Dey will answer to Bwonsamdi soon enough.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kaza'jin's Reclaimed Bijous, Grimoire of the Other Side, and Venerated Remains.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Kaza'jin at the north gate to Warport Rastari.
